description: Try our easy to follow Fish 'n' Oven Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fish 'n' Oven Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: About 10 minutes before the chips are ready, heat 1 cm oil in a large frying pan, add the fish fillets, in 2 batches, and cook over a medium heat for 23 minutes on each side until the coating is crisp and golden and the fish is cooked through. Remove from the pan with a fish slice and keep warm in the bottom of the oven while you cook the remainder. Serve with the oven chips and tomato ketchup.
